mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.question_id, t.title_name, t.title_type, g.group_name, t.group_id, t.title_sort, t.title_answer, t.title_score, t.analysis_items, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, q.q_name, u.nick_name as user_name from d_question_title t left join d_question_bank q on t.question_id=q.rec_id left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name left join d_question_title_group g on t.group_id =g.rec_id
